Quote from GM Konacon:

On the first day of Empath Spectacular November (ESN), empaths have FINALLY realized how to be more careful and stay standing when healing leg wounds!

MECHANICS: - Empaths won't fall down when transferring leg wounds anymore.

~ Konacon
